comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is actually the concourse/rotunda in New York Pennsylvania Station (post-Madison Square Garden construction).

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thanks, TVL1970! You are correct. This is Penn Station, not Grand Central Terminal. We will work to update our descriptive data on this image.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
